channel.title: Frequently Asked Questions on Convoy Fire & EMS
channel.description: Recent content in Frequently Asked Questions on Convoy Fire & EMS

item.title: Becoming a Volunteer
item.description: Our Volunteers are needed to keep our community safe. We are looking for volunteers to help staff emergency services.

item.title: Open Burning
item.description: Open burning is any set outdoor fire that does not vent to a chimney or stack.

item.title: What is the Fire Department auxiliary?
item.description: A fire department auxiliary is a dedicated group of volunteers who provide invaluable support and assistance to the main fire department.
